Specimens From December 16, 2003, to January 8, 2004, four SARS cases were identified in Guangzhou, Guangdong Province, China. initial tests by the Center for Disease Control and Prevention of Guangdong Province and the Center for Disease Control and Prevention of Guangzhou were positive for SARS-CoV. confirmatory testing was performed by the Institute for Viral Disease Control and Prevention and Institute for Communicable Infection Disease. cases exemplify the successful collaboration between local and WHO Network Laboratories.
